pson-Golabi-Behmel syndrome ?,The incidence of Simpson-Golabi-Behmel syndrome is unknown. At least 130 people worldwide have been diagnosed with this disorder.,GHR,Simpson-Golabi-Behmel syndrome
What are the genetic changes related to Simpson-Golabi-Behmel syndrome ?,"Mutations in the GPC3 gene are responsible for some cases of Simpson-Golabi-Behmel syndrome. This gene provides instructions for making a protein called glypican 3, which is involved in the regulation of cell growth and division (c
